undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]

I'm Sorry, But You Do Need a Budget

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]When we think of Retirement, we may forget that there are two sides to the financial equation:  Income and Expenses. We spend almost all of our time on the Income side, doing hours of research to build the perfect portfolio.  Yet this is the side over which we have only limited control.  On the other side of the equation, the Expense side, we have great control, but spend little time on it.  Few of us have a written budget.  Why?[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20why%20we%20hate%20budgets%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20to%20build%20a%20budget%20that%20reduces%20stress%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20to%20build%20a%20budget%20that%20serves%20you%2C%20rather%20than%20one%20that%20you%20serve%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#45c168" icon_background="#ffffff" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2345c168"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]

Annuity Basics

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]If you ask most financial advisors, they will tell you that an annuity is the solution to all your problems.  It can guarantee you a lifetime of income.  And a walk on the beach with a spouse who looks 20 years younger.  If you ask Ken Fisher, an annuity is an expensive financial “product” that is great for the advisor, but not for the sucker who buys it.  The truth lies somewhere in between.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20the%20basic%20mechanics%20of%20how%20an%20annuity%20works%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20the%20three%20basic%20types%20of%20annuity%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20to%20use%20an%20annuity%20to%20meet%20your%20goals%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#45c168" icon_background="#ffffff" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2345c168"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color="blue"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1604357874497{background-color: #d6f9f2 !important;}"]

During this period of the COVID-19 pandemic, you are encouraged

to consider making a contribution of $10 or $15 to support

the Los Angeles Chapter - AAII ongoing expenses.

To contribute you may (CLICK HERE). Thank You!

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
